titleStmt.title: A brief account of the intended Bank of England
titleStmt.author: Paterson, William, 1658-1719.
Godfrey, Michael, d. 1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Wrongly attributed to Michael Godfrey. BM attributes to William Paterson, who founded the Bank of England in 1694.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
